allFeatures.name: Favored Enemy
allFeatures.description: You have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to a certain type of enemy.

allFeatures.name: Natural Explorer
allFeatures.description: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions.

allFeatures.name: Fighting Style
allFeatures.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

allFeatures.name: Spellcasting
allFeatures.description: By the time you reach 2nd level, you have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells, much as a druid does.

allFeatures.name: Primeval Awareness
allFeatures.description: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action and expend one ranger spell slot to focus your awareness on the region around you.

allFeatures.name: Ranger Archetype
allFeatures.description: At 3rd level, you choose an archetype that you strive to emulate.
